fn.p: Funding. This research project is co-financed by the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) under the Operational Program Epirus 2014-2020, NSRF 2014-2020. Project Code: HÎ 1AB-0028192. Acronym: Innochicken. Oregano and garlic plant material was kindly donated by Mr. Fotis Stavratis, Aromata Epirus, Palaiohori, Filiates Thesprotia, Epirus, Greece.
